title: [PaletteKit] ReferenceError: windowColor is not defined
body:
## Error Details
- Extension: PaletteKit v3.4.5
- Message: windowColor is not defined
- Fingerprint: pk-204
- Timestamp: 2025-03-18T15:01:00Z

## Stack Trace
```
ReferenceError: windowColor is not defined
    at content/colors.js:88:12
    at content/controller.js:45:8
```

## Breadcrumbs
1. User opened the palette modal
2. Content script applied theme
3. Background acknowledged theme change
